amendment.description: To provide that none of the funds authorized to be appropriated to the Department of Energy under this Act may be made available for the Robust Nuclear Earth Penetrator.

vote.text: Amendment SA 2552 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 2552 proposed by Senator Warner for Senator Kennedy. (consideration: CR S12778-12791; text: CR S12786) To provide that none of the funds authorized to be appropriated to the Department of Energy under this Act may be made available for the Robust Nuclear Earth Penetrator.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 2552 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 2552 proposed by Senator Warner for Senator Kennedy.
